question: 楓
sourceAnswer:
<read>かえで</read>|<read>かえるで</read>:: maple-(tree)-(Acer-spp.)
<read>ふう</read>:: Formosan-sweetgum-(Liquidambar-formosana)
activeAnswer:

sourceMnemonic: The kanji and the word are exactly the same. That means they share meanings as well.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This has the same reading as the kanji you learned, meaning you know the reading!
